# Copilot Resources Summary

## Overview

This document provides a complete inventory of all GitHub Copilot customization resources added from the [awesome-copilot](https://github.com/github/awesome-copilot) repository.

## Total Resources: 407

- **Agents**: 130 files
- **Instructions**: 151 files
- **Prompts**: 126 files

## ü§ñ Custom Agents (130 files)

### General Development Agents

## üìÅ Installation & Usage

### Automatic Installation

All files have been automatically placed in the correct locations:
- `.github/agents/` - All agent files
- `.github/instructions/` - All instruction files
- `.github/prompts/` - All prompt files

### Using the Resources

1. **Agents**: Use `@agent-name` in Copilot Chat
2. **Instructions**: Auto-apply based on file patterns
3. **Prompts**: Use `/prompt-name` in Copilot Chat

### Complete Documentation

See `COPILOT_RESOURCES_GUIDE.md` for:
- Detailed explanations of each resource type
- 8 practical workflows
- Usage examples
- Best practices
- Quick reference guide

## üîó Links

- **Source Repository**: [github/awesome-copilot](https://github.com/github/awesome-copilot)
- **MCP Server**: [Install awesome-copilot MCP](https://aka.ms/awesome-copilot/mcp/vscode-insiders)
- **Documentation**: [Copilot Customization Docs](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization)
